channel.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

This is the complete code needed to be added to addSkillXP() method in PlayerAssistant.java for people that may need it later.
It includes the Server announcement that displays when a player reaches 200M EXP in a skill. + The name of the actual skill all in one.
It was done with the help of everyone in this thread.

if (amount + c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) { c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000; sendMessageToAllPlayers("<shad=15695415>[SERVER]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M experience in " + PlayerAssistant.getSkillName(skill)); return true; }

It requires this method. Add this anywhere in PlayerAssistant.java

public static void sendMessageToAllPlayers(String msg) { for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { Client user = (Client) player; user.sendMessage(msg); } } }

Also updated the first page of this thread with the answer

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Vhenom:

That worked perfectly. Thank you very much. Could you explain what parts you changed so I can understand it better? And thank you limits for helping out this whole time. Really appreciate it guys.

I just made it check if you had more than 200m exp before it actually added exp. and if it did it’d set it to 200m, then it’d return false because you had 200m exp.
Then the code under it adds up how much exp you’re going to get. I added a check if the xp it will be adding is greater than 200m, and if it is set it to 200m, plus send the global message.
You should remove the return true because like DAn said, it won’t refresh the xp.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:20, topic:544944”]I’m just taking a shot in the dark here but:

[code=java]public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) {
int random3 = Misc.random(300);
if (c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000)
c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;

if (c.playerXP[skill] == 200000000 || c.xpLock == true || c.Jail == true)
	return false;

if (c.playerRights == 4 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1) {
	c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2.0;
} else if (c.playerRights == 6) {
	c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 3.0;
} else {
	c.playerXP[skill] += amount;
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 5000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 2000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 8000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90
	&& c.playerSkilling[7] == true 
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 10000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 5000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 2000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 8000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90
	&& c.playerIsFiremaking == true 
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 10000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

amount *= Config.DOUBLE_EXP;

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.doubleXpTime < 3600000) {
	amount *= 2.54;
}

if (amount + c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) {
	c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;
	sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience");
	return true;
}

int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
c.playerXP[skill] += amount;

if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) {
	if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])
	&& skill != 3 && skill != 5) {
		c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
	}
	levelUp(skill);
	c.gfx100(199);
	requestUpdates();
}
setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]);
refreshSkill(skill);
return true;

}[/code][/quote]

That worked perfectly. Thank you very much. Could you explain what parts you changed so I can understand it better? And thank you limits for helping out this whole time. Really appreciate it guys.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:20, topic:544944”]I’m just taking a shot in the dark here but:

[code=java]public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) {
int random3 = Misc.random(300);
if (c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000)
c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;

if (c.playerXP[skill] == 200000000 || c.xpLock == true || c.Jail == true)
return false;

if (c.playerRights == 4 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1) {
c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2.0;
} else if (c.playerRights == 6) {
c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 3.0;
} else {
c.playerXP[skill] += amount;
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50
&& c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 5000;
c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerscook + “/150.”);
c.brawlerscook += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20
&& c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 2000;
c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerscook + “/150.”);
c.brawlerscook += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70
&& c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 8000;
c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerscook + “/150.”);
c.brawlerscook += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90
&& c.playerSkilling[7] == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 10000;
c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerscook + “/150.”);
c.brawlerscook += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50
&& c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 5000;
c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerFM + “/150.”);
c.brawlerFM += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20
&& c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 2000;
c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerFM + “/150.”);
c.brawlerFM += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70
&& c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 8000;
c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerFM + “/150.”);
c.brawlerFM += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90
&& c.playerIsFiremaking == true
&& c.inWild()) {
amount += 10000;
c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
+ c.brawlerFM + “/150.”);
c.brawlerFM += 1;
handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

amount *= Config.DOUBLE_EXP;

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.doubleXpTime < 3600000) {
amount *= 2.54;
}

if (amount + c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) {
c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;
sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: “+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience”);
return true;
}

int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
c.playerXP[skill] += amount;

if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) {
if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])
&& skill != 3 && skill != 5) {
c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
}
levelUp(skill);
c.gfx100(199);
requestUpdates();
}
setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]);
refreshSkill(skill);
return true;
}[/code][/quote]

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m just taking a shot in the dark here but:

[code=java]public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) {
int random3 = Misc.random(300);
if (c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000)
c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;

if (c.playerXP[skill] == 200000000 || c.xpLock == true || c.Jail == true)
	return false;

if (c.playerRights == 4 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1) {
	c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2.0;
} else if (c.playerRights == 6) {
	c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 3.0;
} else {
	c.playerXP[skill] += amount;
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 5000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 2000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 8000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90
	&& c.playerSkilling[7] == true 
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 10000;
	c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerscook + "/150.");
	c.brawlerscook += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlers();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 5000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 2000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70
	&& c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 8000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90
	&& c.playerIsFiremaking == true 
		&& c.inWild()) {
	amount += 10000;
	c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: "
	+ c.brawlerFM + "/150.");
	c.brawlerFM += 1;
	handleDegradingBrawlersFM();
}

amount *= Config.DOUBLE_EXP;

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.doubleXpTime < 3600000) {
	amount *= 2.54;
}

if (amount + c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) {
	c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000;
	sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience");
	return true;
}

int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
c.playerXP[skill] += amount;

if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) {
	if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])
	&& skill != 3 && skill != 5) {
		c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
	}
	levelUp(skill);
	c.gfx100(199);
	requestUpdates();
}
setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]);
refreshSkill(skill);
return true;

}[/code]

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Vhenom:

Yes of course.

Add a large group of variables that are booleans that say if the player has reached 200m in the stat, like this: (example, this won’t work obviously)

1 = true
0 = false

player-200mexp-0 = 0
player-200mexp-1 = 0
player-200mexp-2 = 0
player-200mexp-3 = 0
player-200mexp-4 = 0
player-200mexp-5 = 0
player-200mexp-6 = 0
player-200mexp-7 = 0
player-200mexp-8 = 0
player-200mexp-9 = 0

etc… for every stat and then have an int[] array in the player class that when you load the player up again it sets the int[] array slots to 1 or 0. Then in the addSkillExp method check to see if it is a 1 and if it isn’t display the message.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:15, topic:544944”][quote author=Limits link=topic=663822.msg4436934#msg4436934 date=1405378622]

I basically just added Dan0194’s code to the top so u see where to put it. Just replace the method with this.

[font=verdana]Do this[/font]public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) { if(c.playerXP[skill] < 200000000 && (c.playerXP[skill] + amount) >= 200000000) { sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience.");} int random3 = Misc.random(300); if (c.xpLock == true || c.Jail == true) { if (random3 == 1) { c.sendMessage("No XP added - reason: XP LOCK!"); } return false; } if (c.playerRights == 4 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2.0; } else if (c.playerRights == 6) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 3.0; } else { c.playerXP[skill] += amount; } if (amount + c.playerXP[skill] < 0 || c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) { sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience"); if (c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) { c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000; } return false; } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50 && c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 5000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20 && c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 2000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70 && c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 8000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 10000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50 && c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 5000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20 && c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 2000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70 && c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 8000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 10000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } amount *= Config.DOUBLE_EXP; if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.doubleXpTime < 3600000) { amount *= 2.54; } int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.playerXP[skill] += amount; if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) { if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) && skill != 3 && skill != 5) { c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); } levelUp(skill); c.gfx100(199); requestUpdates(); } setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]); refreshSkill(skill); return true; }

[/quote]

That works perfectly and all but it still says the message everytime u get a little more xp. It does that since it resets back to 200m xp so you can’t go higher then that.[/quote]
Do you know how to add more variables to the player save?

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:14, topic:544944”]I basically just added Dan0194’s code to the top so u see where to put it. Just replace the method with this.

[quote author=Limits link=topic=663822.msg4436925#msg4436925 date=1405377572]

[font=verdana]Do this[/font]public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) { if(c.playerXP[skill] < 200000000 && (c.playerXP[skill] + amount) >= 200000000) { sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience.");} int random3 = Misc.random(300); if (c.xpLock == true || c.Jail == true) { if (random3 == 1) { c.sendMessage("No XP added - reason: XP LOCK!"); } return false; } if (c.playerRights == 4 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2.0; } else if (c.playerRights == 6) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 3.0; } else { c.playerXP[skill] += amount; } if (amount + c.playerXP[skill] < 0 || c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) { sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience"); if (c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) { c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000; } return false; } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50 && c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 5000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20 && c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 2000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70 && c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 8000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 10000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50 && c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 5000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20 && c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 2000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70 && c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 8000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 10000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } amount *= Config.DOUBLE_EXP; if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.doubleXpTime < 3600000) { amount *= 2.54; } int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.playerXP[skill] += amount; if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) { if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) && skill != 3 && skill != 5) { c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); } levelUp(skill); c.gfx100(199); requestUpdates(); } setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]); refreshSkill(skill); return true; }
[/quote][/quote]

That works perfectly and all but it still says the message everytime u get a little more xp. It does that since it resets back to 200m xp so you can’t go higher then that.

Read full topic

Here it is

public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill) { int random3 = Misc.random(300); if (c.xpLock == true || c.Jail == true) { if (random3 == 1) { c.sendMessage("No XP added - reason: XP LOCK!"); } return false; } if (c.playerRights == 4 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2.0; } else if (c.playerRights == 6) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 3.0; } else { c.playerXP[skill] += amount; } if (amount + c.playerXP[skill] < 0 || c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) { if (c.playerXP[skill] > 200000000) { c.playerXP[skill] = 200000000; } return false; } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50 && c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 5000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20 && c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 2000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70 && c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 8000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90 && c.playerSkilling[7] == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 10000; c.sendMessage("[COOKING BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerscook + "/150."); c.brawlerscook += 1; handleDegradingBrawlers(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 50 && c.playerLevel[7] < 70 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 5000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 5K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 20 && c.playerLevel[7] < 50 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 2000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 2K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 70 && c.playerLevel[7] < 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 8000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 8K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } if (c.wearingFMBrawlers() && c.playerLevel[7] > 90 && c.playerIsFiremaking == true && c.inWild()) { amount += 10000; c.sendMessage("[FM BRAWLERS] 10K Bonus XP Added. Charges: " + c.brawlerFM + "/150."); c.brawlerFM += 1; handleDegradingBrawlersFM(); } amount *= Config.DOUBLE_EXP; if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.doubleXpTime < 3600000) { amount *= 2.54; } int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.playerXP[skill] += amount; if (oldLevel < getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill])) { if (c.playerLevel[skill] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) && skill != 3 && skill != 5) { c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); } levelUp(skill); c.gfx100(199); requestUpdates(); } setSkillLevel(skill, c.playerLevel[skill], c.playerXP[skill]); refreshSkill(skill); return true; }

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:3, topic:544944”]Yes, it’s handled in the levelUp method. Which does switch statements

case 2: sendFrame126( "Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207); sendFrame126("Your strength level is now " + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) + ".", 6208); c.sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level."); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Combat Level: " + c.getCombatLevel() + "", 3983); sendFrame164(6206); if (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) { for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Server] <shad=15536940>" + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has just achieved level 99 Strength!"); } } } break;[/quote]

That’s the problem, 200M exp isn’t a level that you can level up to, therefore this method is never called when you have 200m exp.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] 200M Server Announcement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:1, topic:544944”]I’ve been trying to add a server announcement whenever a player reaches 200M Experience in a skill but it never works. I think my problem is not putting it in the right place. I’ve tried putting it right where it says “You have achieved level 99 strength” with an if statement checking to see if xp is >= to 200m and in the addExperience() method

Here’s my sendMessageToAllPlayers method

public static void sendMessageToAllPlayers(String msg) { for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { Client user = (Client) player; user.sendMessage(msg); } } }

and the code im using to verify 200m xp

if (c.playerXP[skill] >= 200000000) { sendMessageToAllPlayers("<col=355>[SERVER]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " has achieved 200M Experience"); }

Any help would be really appreciated. Thanks guys.[/quote]

So does the 99 skill message work?
